name: Onryo (Sachin Kishan)
description:
You are a ghost who must escape the light! Use your powers to black the lights out and escape the dungeon but be careful, your power is limited and regenerates little by little over time. Reach the end of the dungeon to move to the next level. Make sure you move quickly before your health runs out!

CONTROLS

Space bar- black out the lights for a very small time (20 souls)

Directional keys - for movement

CREDITS: Art

Sneha

Stryke

Sylvium

Coding

Firox

Sachin Kishan

G_us

Audio

Ruzab K

This was a submission for the Br=rackeys 2021.2 game jam! The theme was "Let there be chaos". We thought of the chaos coming from having to navigate through big dungeons and avoiding lots of light.
